response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with our premium product, which I believe would significantly enhance your operations or personal endeavors. Given its exceptional value and quality, I understand it holds a high importance for you, being worth $15,000 to you. My offer to you is to purchase this product at a price of $12,000. This represents a fair compromise, allowing you to acquire the product at a price below its perceived value while ensuring a substantial return for me. I look forward to your positive response.", "product_price": 12000}
